description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，华国锋执政时期奉行的政治原则，即“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”。
description.en: A political principle followed during Hua Guofeng's rule after the Cultural Revolution, stating: 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、国务院总理。在文化大革命结束后短暂执政，主张“两个凡是”。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council. He briefly ruled after the Cultural Revolution and advocated for the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, the main founder of the People's Republic of China and its first paramount leader.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The position of the highest leader of the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理
en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）的首长。
description.en: The head of the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级领导人，“凡是派”的主要成员之一。
description.en: A high-ranking leader of the Communist Party of China, one of the main members of the 'Whateverist Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，以华国锋、汪东兴等人为代表的，坚持“两个凡是”原则的中共党内政治派系。
description.en: A political faction within the CPC after the Cultural Revolution, represented by figures like Hua Guofeng and Wang Dongxing, who adhered to the 'Two Whatevers' principle.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1977年2月7日《人民日报》发表的社论，其内容包含“两个凡是”的经典表述，旨在转移公众对为四五天安门事件平反和邓小平复出等问题的注意力。
description.en: An editorial published in the People's Daily on February 7, 1977, which contained the classic formulation of the 'Two Whatevers' and aimed to divert public attention from issues such as the rehabilitation of the 1976 Tiananmen Incident and the return of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 受汪东兴指示，组织撰写了社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: Under Wang Dongxing's instruction, he organized the writing of the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: Chinese politician, the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 to 1989, and the chief architect of Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

zh-cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
en: Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth

description.zh-cn: 1978年5月11日发表于《光明日报》的评论文章，引发了关于真理标准问题的大讨论，动摇了“两个凡是”的理论基础。
description.en: A commentary article published in Guangming Daily on May 11, 1978, which triggered the great discussion on the criterion of truth and shook the theoretical foundation of the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，曾任中共中央主席和总书记。他审定了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC. He reviewed and approved the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主办的，以知识分子为主要读者的思想文化大报。
description.en: A major ideological and cultural newspaper run by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, primarily targeting intellectuals.

en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
The great discussion on the criterion of truth

description.zh-cn: 一场始于1978年的思想解放运动，旨在批判“两个凡是”，确立“实践是检验真理的唯一标准”的马克思主义思想路线。
description.en: An ideological emancipation movement that began in 1978, aimed at criticizing the 'Two Whatevers' and establishing the Marxist ideological line that 'practice is the sole criterion for testing truth'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月召开的中共中央会议，会议上批评了“两个凡是”，标志着中国进入改革开放新时期。
description.en: A CPC Central Committee meeting held in December 1978 that criticized the 'Two Whatevers' and marked the beginning of China's reform and opening-up period.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的最高负责人，是中国人民解放军的最高统帅。
description.en: The supreme head of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China, and the commander-in-chief of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 华国锋在其执政时期奉行“两个凡是”原则，并于1976年10月26日首次提出这一主张。
description.en: Hua Guofeng followed the 'Two Whatevers' principle during his rule and first proposed this idea on October 26, 1976.

description.zh-cn: “两个凡是”原则的核心是维护毛泽东生前作出的所有决策和指示，完全基于其个人权威。
description.en: The core of the 'Two Whatevers' principle was to uphold all decisions and instructions made by Mao Zedong during his lifetime, based entirely on his personal authority.

中华人民共和国国务院总理
中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 华国锋是“凡是派”的代表人物。
description.en: Hua Guofeng was the representative figure of the 'Whateverist Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴是“凡是派”的代表人物之一。
description.en: Wang Dongxing was one of the representative figures of the 'Whateverist Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴指示李鑫组织撰写社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: Wang Dongxing instructed Li Xin to organize the writing of the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link'.

description.zh-cn: 这篇社论的发表，使“两个凡是”成为广为人知的经典表述。
description.en: The publication of this editorial made the 'Two Whatevers' a widely known classic formulation.

description.zh-cn: 刊登了社论《学好文件抓住纲》。
description.en: Published the editorial 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link'.

description.zh-cn: 该社论旨在转移社会上要求为“四五运动”平反的注意力。
description.en: The editorial aimed to divert public attention from calls to rehabilitate the 'April Fifth Movement'.

description.zh-cn: 该社论旨在转移社会上要求邓小平复出的注意力。
description.en: The editorial aimed to divert public attention from calls for Deng Xiaoping's political comeback.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央组织部部长的胡耀邦审定了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, then head of the CPC Central Committee's Organization Department, reviewed and approved the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 发表了评论文章《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: Published the commentary article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

relationships.source: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 该文的发表引发了“真理标准大讨论”。
description.en: The publication of this article triggered 'the great discussion on the criterion of truth'.

description.zh-cn: 这场大讨论从根本上批判和动摇了“两个凡是”的理论基础。
description.en: This great discussion fundamentally criticized and undermined the theoretical basis of the 'Two Whatevers'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届三中全会公开批评了“两个凡是”的思想。
description.en: The Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee publicly criticized the ideology of the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平等人批评了与华国锋有直接关系的“两个凡是”，最终导致华国锋下台。
description.en: At the Third Plenum of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping and others criticized the 'Two Whatevers', which were directly linked to Hua Guofeng, ultimately leading to Hua's removal from power.

description.zh-cn: 因坚持“两个凡是”的错误，华国锋先后辞去国务院总理、中共中央主席和中央军委主席职务。
description.en: Due to his insistence on the mistake of the 'Two Whatevers', Hua Guofeng resigned successively from his posts as Premier, CPC Chairman, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.
